original_title: Magical Israel: A Journey Through 5,000 Years of History
overview: The many, sometimes beautiful, relics and special places, to which so many were attracted - to this day - are ideally suited for a range of interesting TV programs. It's not just Jewish sites. The Holy Land has a magnetic attraction for many and it is the broad spectrum of cultures that together provide a fascinating picture: Magic Israel.
title: Magical Israel: A Journey Through 5,000 Years of History
